title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
about_company: InnovateTech is a fast-growing fintech startup revolutionizing how people manage their personal finances. We have 50 employees and recently raised our Series B funding.
about_role: We're looking for a Senior Full-Stack Engineer to join our core product team. You'll be building features that directly impact millions of users and working closely with product and design teams.
responsibilities: Design and implement new features for our web and mobile applications
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
Collaborate with product managers and designers to define technical requirements
Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews
Participate in architectural decisions and technical planning
Contribute to improving our engineering practices and tools

must_have: 5+ years of professional software development experience
Strong proficiency in React and TypeScript
Experience with Node.js or Python backend development
Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
nice_to_have: Experience in fintech or financial services
